verses.roman:
sabāi rahila, keha calite nārila
āra dina pāṅca-sāta ei-mate gela

synonyms: sabāi rahila—all of them stayed; keha calite nārila—no one could move; āra—further; dina pāṅca-sāta—five to seven days; ei-mate—in this way; gela—passed.
translation: Unable to leave, everyone remained there, and five to seven more days thus passed by.
